Headline: Yellow Line Service Temporarily Suspended
ShortDescription: Service on the Yellow Line has been temporarily suspended due to an incident at Howard

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Yellow Line has been temporarily suspended due to an incident at Howard.

Shuttle bus service is available between Howard and Skokie/Dempster, serving all affected stations during normal hours of operation.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include the #97 Skokie bus route.

We are working to restore service as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #6 Jackson Park ExpressTemporary Southbound 6 Jackson Park Express Reroute near Lake Shore Drive/47th.
ShortDescription: SB 6 Jackson Park Express buses are temp. rerouted via Lake Shore Dr., Oakwood, Cottage Gr, 47th and Lake Park: due to, street blockage near Lake Shore Dr/47th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Lake Shore Dr., Oakwood, Cottage Grove, 47th and Lake Park: due to, street blockage near Lake Shore Drive/47th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
